name: Forever Dusk
description:
Play as the Orbital Guardian of the Dawn and protect yourself from the incoming orc army. Use your powers from the sun and the moon to shoot your way through enemies, or combine your powers for one massive attack.

This game was made in 84 hours as a part of the IGDFE Game Jam.

This is also my first game jam game and my first published game!

Update 1.0.2 - fixed bugs with audio and damage; changed rate of fire to 2 shots per second

Made in the Godot engine.
